definitions.definition: a man who has never been married

examples.text: an eligible bachelor (= one that many people want to marry, especially because he is rich)
a **confirmed bachelor** *(= a man who does not intend to marry)*
He was 38, and a confirmed bachelor.
one of the country’s most eligible bachelors

definitions.definition: a person who has a Bachelor’s degree (= a first university degree)
a small apartment suitable for a person living alone

wordOrigin: Middle English: from Old French bacheler; of uncertain origin.
